question_text: Which of the following statements are true about refresh rate and performance in gaming? (Select all that apply)
answer_options: High refresh rate monitors provide smoother visuals when FPS is high
VSYNC prevents frame tearing but can introduce latency
Matching FPS to refresh rate improves perceived motion smoothness
Higher refresh rate can reduce power draw
correct_answer: High refresh rate monitors provide smoother visuals when FPS is high
VSYNC prevents frame tearing but can introduce latency
Matching FPS to refresh rate improves perceived motion smoothness
explanation: Refresh rate and FPS synchronization impact smoothness and latency, while resolution and power draw are separate concerns.
